name: Mayan Temple: Jungle Marble
description:
Mayan Temple: Jungle Marble is a zuma-style game full with interesting and challenging. Your target is complete all the temple quest: eliminate all the Marble lines by marble canon before the time up or before they reach the end of the path. This marble shooting game has many different maps to make the marble shoot game more addictive, more interesting than every marble games.
How to play:
1. Touch the screen where you want to shoot
2. Match 3 or more same marbles to eliminate them
3. More combos and chains to get more scores and three stars
